SPELL_ABILITY.FILTER: return (FilteredCard() ~= nil) and (FilteredCard():GetOwner() == EffectController()) and (FilteredCard():GetZone() == ZONE_GRAVEYARD) and (FilteredCard():GetCardType():IsPermanent() ~= 0) and (MTG():Interrogate_CardDiedThisTurn( FilteredCard() ) == 1)
SPELL_ABILITY.RESOLUTION_TIME_ACTION: local filtered_obj = FilteredCard() if filtered_obj ~= nil then if filtered_obj:GetCardType():Test( CARD_TYPE_ENCHANTMENT ) ~= 0 and filtered_obj:GetSubType():Test( ENCHANTMENT_TYPE_AURA ) ~= 0 then if card:CanBePlayed( EffectController() ) then EffectController():PseudoPlaySpell( filtered_obj ) end else filtered_obj:PutIntoPlay( EffectController() ) end end
